1.name: Honey Cottage Cheese Breakfast on Village Bread
1.preparation: Lightly toast the village bread. Sprinkle cottage cheese on top, add walnuts, and drizzle with honey before serving.

2.name: Whole Wheat Jam & Cheese Toast
2.preparation: Place cheddar cheese and cherry jam between the slices of bread. Toast in a sandwich maker and serve hot.

3.name: Avocado & White Cheese Sandwich (on Ancient Wheat Bread)
3.preparation: Mash the avocado and mix with lemon juice and black pepper. Spread it on the ancient wheat bread, add white cheese, and assemble the sandwich.

4.name: Cheese & Roasted Vegetable Open Sandwich
4.preparation: Place tulum cheese on the bread, then add roasted bell pepper and eggplant. Drizzle with olive oil and serve.

5.name: Fermented Green Salad
5.preparation: Place mixed greens in a bowl. Add chopped pickles and white cheese. Season with lemon juice and olive oil, then mix well.

6.name: Tangy Sweet Beetroot Salad
6.preparation: Mix the beetroot, carrot, and apple slices. Add walnuts and cottage cheese. Season with pomegranate molasses and olive oil.

7.name: Colorful Grilled Bell Pepper Salad
7.preparation: Combine all ingredients in a bowl, crumble feta cheese on top, and season with olive oil and vinegar.

8.name: Pickled Avocado Salad
8.preparation: Mix all ingredients and top with goat cheese. Season with lemon juice and olive oil.

9.name: Baked Pumpkin Soup
9.preparation: Roast the pumpkin. Sauté onion and garlic, then blend with broth and milk. Season and serve.

10.name: Leek and Potato Soup
10.preparation: Cook vegetables in broth, blend, add milk, and top with white cheese.

11.name: Grilled Eggplant Yogurt Soup
11.preparation: Mix yogurt with broth, add eggplant and chickpeas, garnish with dill and olive oil.

12.name: Swiss Chard and Cottage Cheese Soup
12.preparation: Sauté onion and garlic, add chard and broth. Top with cottage cheese before serving.

13.name: Grilled Vegetable & Cheese Sandwich
13.preparation: Assemble grilled vegetables and cheese between toasted bread slices. Season and serve.

14.name: Rich Stuffed Whole Wheat Sandwich
14.preparation: Layer ingredients in bread, drizzle sauce, and serve warm or cold.

15.name: Baked Cheese & Vegetable Village Bread Bowl
15.preparation: Fill bread with cheese, spinach, and peppers. Bake until golden.

16.name: Baked Cottage Cheese Cauliflower Gratin
16.preparation: Mix ingredients, layer over cauliflower, and bake until golden.

17.name: Baked Pear & Cherry Jam Dessert
17.preparation: Top bread with cheese, pear slices, jam, and hazelnuts.

18.name: Fermented Fruit & Yogurt Dessert Bowl
18.preparation: Layer ingredients in a bowl and garnish with cinnamon.

20.name: Milky & Hazelnut Plum Jam Toast
20.preparation: Soak bread in milk, top with cheese and jam.
